group_1.narration: Nothing but rotten people, gushing forth@one after the other.
I crush each one under my feet, but if@even one survives, they regrow. Like cancer.@Then they spread the rot to other people.

group_1.textCenter: (I should've been way more thorough@when this all began.)

group_1.narration: I'm gonna cut the cord on my "real" past,@starting now.
It all began on that day...
I didn't ask to be born with this face,@but it's gotten me lumped in with a lot@of unsavory characters. People you'd@never want to be associated with...
I didn't want people to get away with doing@whatever they want, so I fought back.@Which meant...I got into scuffles every day.
And I accepted that. Sometimes I still think,@"If I only had a kinder looking face."@But that's just useless wishing, you know?
So I'm fine with whatever@happens to me. I get it.@But I can't stand it when they@drag others into my mess.

group_1.textRight: [bgEffect:shakeLarge]How long you gonna stand there like that?!
Get on your knees. Beg for my forgiveness.

group_1.textLeft: If I do that, you'll let her go.

group_1.textRight: What you did before hurt real bad...
A full swing to the gut with a steel pipe...@You messed me up pretty damn good.
So you better start making it up to me!
After that... That's when I'll decide what@I'll do with this girl.
I wanna make sure you regret EVER@laying a hand on me!

group_1.textLeft: You don't have to apologize. It's my fault.
This wouldn't have happened if you never@met me.

group_1.narration: The girl he's holding is part of our school's@Beautification Committee. She's the only@one at school not afraid to hang out with me.
The bastard used that to his advantage.@The other day, he made the standard@idiotic accusation of me glaring at him,@so I drove him off.
But as it turns out...he was a member of@one of the crime syndicates in Kamihama.@And he says I've ruined his reputation,@so now he's out for my blood.
Meaning, I brought about this whole mess.

group_1.textRight: So many choices... What part of her should@I break?
Maybe I'll cut her face up.

group_1.textLeft: I'll kneel, I'll beg, whatever you want!@Just let her go!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, you better get on your knees.@And THEN I'll get started on her.
If you try to make a move I'll stab her.@Then I'm gonna beat the shit outta you too.
And don't get any funny ideas... I'M the@one callin' the shots here!
You better watch it, trash. Think callin'@me names is gonna help?!
Shut your mouth and watch. This'll be a@show to remember!

group_1.textLeft: (What do I do?! What CAN I even do?!)

group_1.narration: Kanae Yukino...@I'd like you to listen to my offer.
I think you'll find it helpful in your @current situation.

group_1.textRight: Huh? What's wrong with you?! Your eyes@are dartin' all over the place...
You little punk. Did you bring someone@with you?!

group_1.textLeft: (But I could've sworn...I heard a voice.)

group_1.textRight: Little shits! Get out here where I can@see ya!

group_1.narration: Let's hash it out before something happens,@Kanae Yukino.

group_1.textLeft: (The voice... It's in my head?! What kind@of messed up trick is this?!)
